title: Dragonbound
description: Horrific are a dragon claws, its fiery breath and buffeting wings. Potent is its body, fraught with magic down to the very last glistening scale. But most fearsome of all is a dragon cunning and the soul that allows it to bond with humans.Sabina was the one girl of her generation chosen as Dragonmaid, friend and caregiver to the copper dragon of her nation tyrant king. There she witnessed the greed, lust and rage such a beast could incite and acquired her own very dark secret.
author: Jade Lee
